PageTitle: bestroute routerid-prior-clusterlist (BGP-IPv4 multicast address family view)
FuncDef:
The bestroute routerid-prior-clusterlist command enables Router ID to take precedence over Cluster_List during MBGP route selection.
The undo bestroute routerid-prior-clusterlist command restores the default configurations.
By default, Cluster_List takes precedence over Router ID during MBGP route selection.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
On an MBGP network, after a device receives multiple routes with the same prefix but different paths from different peers, the router needs to select an optimal route from these routes to forward packets. By default, Cluster_List takes precedence over Router ID during MBGP route selection. To enable Router ID to take precedence over Cluster_List during MBGP route selection, run the bestroute routerid-prior-clusterlist command.
